request.description: Creates environment with provided vRealize Suite Products payload in the body.

Add additional component (additional node) to an existing product in the environment.
- Only one node addition can be triggered per addNode request
- Out of the available node types the following node types cannot be scaled: 'vra-server-primary', 'db', 'vrli-master','iaas-manager-active','master','managementagent','replica'
- Out of all the properties ipAddress, hostname and name (VM Name) are mandatory parameters to be set
- Use 'Component List' samples to find the available node-type's for a particular product and version
- Use 'Node Properties List' samples to find the required properties to be added for a node. Each property name can be identified from the 'Key' in the response from 'Node Properties List' APIs

body.raw:
{
  "id": "vrbc",
  "version": "7.3.0",
  "clusterVIP": [],
  "properties": {
    "currency": "USD - US Dollar"
  },
  "nodes": [
    {
      "sourceLink": "",
      "type": "vrb-server",
      "properties": {
        "esxHost": "w3-hs1-050220.eng.vmware.com",
        "guestFullName": "SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 (64-bit)",
        "ipAddress": "10.198.34.127",
        "cpu": "4",
        "vCenterHost": "lcm-vc.sqa.local",
        "ssoTenant": "vsphere.local",
        "storage": "FC-LUN-15 TB",
        "userName": "Administrator@vsphere.local",
        "productName": "vRealize Business for Cloud",
        "network": "infra-traffic-1006",
        "isTelemetryEnable": "true",
        "hostname": "lcm-34-127.sqa.local",
        "password": "Vk13YXJlMSE=",
        "productVersion": "7.2.1.10029 Build 5101870",
        "powerState": "poweredOn",
        "cafeHost": "lcm-34-121.sqa.local",
        "memoryInMb": "8192",
        "name": "S2-vrb-server",
        "vrbRootPassword": ""
      }
    }
  ]
}
